sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A true reporte of the great ouerthrowe lately giuen vnto the Spaniards, in their resolute assault of Bergen op Zoam, in the lowe countries
[12]+ p.
Printed by G. E[ld] and are to be sold by Iohn Hodgets at his shop in Pauls church-yard, At London : 1605.
Printer's name from STC. Signatures: A⁴ B³+ (-A1). Identified as STC 1900a on UMI microfilm. Imperfect; lacks all after leaf B3. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======

his shop in Pauls church-yard
